# Load Raw Data

Load libraries

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

Load raw data

```{r}
dir.create(path = "../_raw/")

url <- "https://hastie.su.domains/ElemStatLearn/datasets/SAheart.data"

destination <- "../_raw/raw.txt"

download.file(url, destination)
```

Save the loaded data as csv

```{r}
data <- read_delim("../_raw/raw.txt",delim = ",",show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
dir.create(path = "../data/")
write_csv(x = data,file = "../data/loaded.csv")
```

```{r}
head(data)
```
